craftable.name: GiantSlayer
craftable.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 20% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1600 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 60%.

radiant.name: RadiantGiantSlayer
radiant.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 40% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1400 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%.

craftable.name: HextechGunblade
craftable.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 400 damage.

radiant.name: RadiantHextechGunblade
radiant.add_attrs:
The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 40% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Ability Power

craftable.name: SpearofShojin
craftable.add_attrs: The holder's attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

radiant.name: RadiantSpearofShojin
radiant.add_attrs:
The wearer's Basic Attacks restore 15 additional Mana.

Radiant Bonus: +20 Ability Power

craftable.name: GuardianAngel
craftable.add_attrs:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantGuardianAngel
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 100% Health and shed all negative effect.

Radiant Bonus: +30% Attack Speed

craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.add_attrs:
Physical damage heals the holder for 33% of the damage dealt.

Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 30% max health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

radiant.name: RadiantBloodthirster
radiant.add_attrs:
Physical damage heals the holder for 60% of the damage dealt. Upon falling below 40% Health. the holder gain a 40% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds

Radiant Bounus: +20 Attack Damage

craftable.name: ZekesHerald
craftable.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

radiant.name: RadiantZekesHerald
radiant.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain 50% Attack Speed and 10% Lifesteal for the rest of combat.

craftable.name: InfinityEdge
craftable.add_attrs:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantInfinityEdge
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

Radiant Bonus: +40% Critical Strike Damage

craftable.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

radiant.name: RadiantGuinsoosRageblade
radiant.add_attrs:
Attacks grant +10% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Attack Speed

craftable.name: StatikkShiv
craftable.add_attrs: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

radiant.name: RadiantStatikkShiv
radiant.add_attrs: Every third Basic Attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 115 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 70% for 5 seconds.

craftable.name: TitansResolve
craftable.add_attrs:
When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

radiant.name: RadiantTitansResolve
radiant.add_attrs:
When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 4 Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

craftable.name: RunaansHurricane
craftable.add_attrs: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

radiant.name: RadiantRunaansHurricane
radiant.add_attrs:
The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 110% of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effect. These bolts can critically strike.

Radiant Bonus: +30% Attack Speed

craftable.name: LastWhisper
craftable.add_attrs:
When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantLastWhisper
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

Radiant Bonus: +35% Critical Strike Chance

craftable.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craftable.add_attrs: Grants 75 bonus Ability Power (including components).

radiant.name: RadiantRabadonsDeathcap
radiant.add_attrs: Grants 120 bonus Ability Power (including components).

craftable.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craftable.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 
300/350/400★ damage for 8 seconds.

radiant.name: RadiantLocketoftheIronSolari
radiant.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 3 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 400/500/600 ★ damage for 60 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +200 Health for all allies at the start of combat.

craftable.name: IonicSpark
craftable.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

radiant.name: RadiantIonicSpark
radiant.add_attrs:
Enemies within 4 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 300% of their max Mana.

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

craftable.name: Morellonomicon
craftable.add_attrs:
When the holder deals magic damage or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantMorellonomicon
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 120% of the target's maximun Health as true damage over 30 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Starting Mana

craftable.name: FrozenHeart
craftable.add_attrs:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantFrozenHeart
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 50%.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Starting Mana

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.add_attrs: Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 18% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target, abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

radiant.name: RadiantRedemption
radiant.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 2 hexes, healing them for 25% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +350 Health

craftable.name: HandofJustice
craftable.add_attrs:
The holder gains both of the following:
- +10 Attack Damage and +10 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 10% of damage dealt.

At the beginning of each planning phase, one of these buffs is increased to 35(%).

radiant.name: RadiantHandofJustice
radiant.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder gains both of the following:
- +40 Attack Damage and +40 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

craftable.name: BrambleVest
craftable.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

radiant.name: RadiantBrambleVest
radiant.add_attrs:
Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 250/300/350 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 2% max Health per second

craftable.name: SunfireCape
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 20% of their maximum health as true damage over 8 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantSunfireCape
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 4 hexes is burned for 120% of their maximum health as true damage over 30 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 0.5% max Health per second

craftable.name: DragonsClaw
craftable.add_attrs: Grants 200 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 30% of their max Health (1 second cooldown).

radiant.name: RadiantDragonsClaw
radiant.add_attrs:
Grants 300 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 40% of their max Health (1 second cooldown).

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 2% max Health per second

craftable.name: Zephyr
craftable.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantZephyr
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 10 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

Radiant Bonus: +20% Attack Speed for all allies at the start of combat

craftable.name: Quicksilver
craftable.add_attrs:
The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for 15 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadiantQuicksilver
radiant.add_attrs:
[Unique] The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for 30 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +45% Attack Speed

craftable.name: WarmogsArmor
craftable.add_attrs: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

radiant.name: RadiantWarmogsArmor
radiant.add_attrs:
Grants 1800 bonus Health (including components).

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

craftable.name: ThiefsGloves
craftable.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equip 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three item Slots]

radiant.name: RadiantThiefsGloves
radiant.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary Radiant items.
[Consumes Three Item Slots]
